mapper.select: SELECT T.TABLE_NAME AS name, T.TABLE_COMMENT AS remark FROM information_schema.`TABLES` T WHERE T.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'hds_center' ORDER BY T.TABLE_NAME

SELECT C.COLUMN_COMMENT AS name, C.COLUMN_NAME AS fieldName, C.DATA_TYPE AS type, IFNULL(C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,'') AS length, IF(C.IS_NULLABLE='Yes','是','否') isNull, C.COLUMN_COMMENT AS remark FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS` C WHERE C.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName}
